jalse

Class JALSEBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • jalse.JALSEBuilder

  • public final class JALSEBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    A JALSE instance builder where each method in this builder can be chained. It creates the instance using DefaultJALSE with the appropriate ActionEngine implementation and DefaultEntityFactory.

    By default this builder will throw IllegalStateException as the values must be built.

    If Entity must be transfered externally (between two JALSE instances) then unique IDs should be set (UUID.randomUUID() is used by default).
    See Also:
    ForkJoinActionEngine, ThreadPoolActionEngine, ManualActionEngine
